title: Data Extraction from Banner ERP system
snippet:
I am looking for someone with experience with Banner ERP.  I have the need to extract Vendor Master, A/P Invoice and Payment data from a Banner ERP system.  I am looking for someone with Banner knowledge to be able to generate a script to pull that data into a text file.

You will need your own development area to do all the work in.

Let me know if you have any questions.
